channel.title: How to make member
channel.description: I am trying to equip dragon legs on my server but it says i have to be a member. How do i make myself member i know i go into the character file and go to myself but what do i put after the members thing?

item.title: How to make member
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

Look in your character files and click your name and search for character-member = 0 and change it to character-member = 1

It may not be exactly like that but very close just look for root word “MEMBER” change it to 1

Read full topic
